p: This work was inspired by and contributes to the project titled “Intergenerational Transfers of Communal Land: Exploring Climate Change, Privatization, Land Use Change, and Sequestration within Mexican Ejidos,” which was funded by the Fulbright-Garcia Robles U.S. Scholars program. In addition, the Instituto de Investigaciones Sociales of the Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México provided an office space to complete this research.
